description: "Based on a Dutch map of the Sunda Islands, with the text changed to Italian. Some Dutch remains e.g. a label on Borneo: ‘Beajous Afgoden dienars bewonende het middelste gedeelte vant Eilland [Beajous idolaters inhabit the middle part of the Island]’."
title: "Nvoua carta delle Isole di Sunda, come Borneo, Sumatra e Iava Grande &c / fatta in Amsterdam per Jsaac Tirion."
